issue.title: [CI][Python] Enable skipped kartothek integration tests

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16285?focusedCommentId=17526561) by Jacob Wujciak-Jens (assignUser):*
This issue is blocked until kartothek fixes the linked issue.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16285?focusedCommentId=17624363) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
Since we removed the kartothek integration build (ARROW-17889), I think we can close this one
